Package pt.uc.dei.services

package pt.uc.dei.services
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppraisalService
    Service class for managing appraisal-related operations.
    AuthenticationService
     
    AvatarFileService
    Service class for handling avatar file operations such as storage, validation, retrieval, and deletion.
    AvatarFileService.CacheData
    Data class representing cache metadata for a file, including last modified time, file size, and MIME type.
    ConfigurationService
    Service class for managing configuration-related operations.
    CourseFileService
    Service class for handling course image file operations such as storage, validation, retrieval, and deletion.
    CourseFileService.CacheData
    Data class representing cache metadata for a file, including last modified time, file size, and MIME type.
    CourseService
    Service class for managing course-related operations.
    CycleService
    Service class for managing cycle-related operations.
    EmailService
    Service class responsible for sending various types of notification emails to users, managers, and administrators.
    MessageService
    Service class responsible for handling chat and messaging operations between users.
    NotificationService
    Service for creating, sending, and managing user notifications.
    TokenService
    Service class for handling activation token generation and management.
    UserService
    Service class for managing user-related operations in the system.
